{exp:channel:entries channel="orders"} {order_items} Entry Id: {item:entry_id}
Title: {item:title}
Quantity: {item:quantity}

{/order_items} {/exp:channel:entries}
Outputs content from a CartThrob Order Items fieldtype
NOTE: example requires an "orders" channel, "order_items" field, and previous orders
http://cartthrob.com/docs/tags_detail/order_items/
